participant_abstract.sent: Concerned with the overall product design.
The last meeting was more concerned with the functional design aspect.
It was concluded that a TV remote-controller should give the user the flexibility to choose either by content or by channel.
The conventional TV remote-controller gives only the option by channel and not by content.
Hence, our new design is revolutionary in that it can give the user to option of choosing by channel.
This poses a great challenge: how to implement that?
One option is by retrieving XML files from a TV program website provider.

participant_decisions.sent: There should be buttons to choose by contents or by channels.
